main event: A sighting of a yellowish glowing light shaped like a large egg that moved slowly and steadily toward the west before disappearing behind hills.
interesting points: The sighting occurred in July 1955,It was not reported until 9 years later,The object had an old grayish hue and was sharply outlined,The observation lasted for about 10 minutes,The case was categorized as Other Phenomena.
sighted object: a yellowish glowing light shaped like a large egg
witness description: Not reported until 9 years after the sighting.
